name: Medium [Prague] (IAPSOP)
content:
Medium [Prague] (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Medium (Prague) Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Medium. A monthly magazine devoted to the occult, spiritualism, magic, mysticism, astrology and practical psychological teachings. 1933–1940 Monthly Prague, Czechoslovakia. Language: Czech. Editor: A. Kodyn; A. Janacek. 1/1, 1933. Described as "devoted to occultism, spiritualism, magic, mysticism, astrology and practical psychic science." Issues:Medium (Prague) 1933 Partial
